title: Khan Says Blockchain Provides Piece of Mind
itunes:title: Khan Says Blockchain Provides Piece of Mind
description:
Technology Futurist Ian Khan discusses blockchain and the future of cryptocurrencies.

Host Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
